metadata.title: CVE-2021-3601 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: Cert signed by CA with constraint 'CA:FALSE' are considered valid

notes.note: mdeslaur> this affects 1.0.2 and earlier only as of 2019-06-18, upstream will not be fixing this, and no fix is available we will not be fixing this issue in Ubuntu, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: openssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1j-1ubuntu3').
